description: Support to the UN Country Team through the Office of the UN Resident Coordinator, including joint UN communications, UN Human Rights Advisor and support to UN joint programming

subproject.title: UN Coordination for Results

subproject.description: UN priorities are communicated in a coherent and strategic manner, and awareness is raised on common thematic areas, such as MDGs and human rights, and other international standards and commitments. In this context, advocacy events are organized and key issues are communicated through communication strategies, consultations, public debates and thematic PR events targeting specific groups such as central public authorities, civil society organizations and donor community.
subproject.title: UN Advocacy and Partnerships

title: Support to UN Coordination
